description: Defines the BusinessGroup class modeling a business grouping of vehicles, including serialization/deserialization and copy functionality.

classes.name: BusinessGroup
classes.description: A data model representing a business group for organizing vehicles, with methods for mapping to/from database format and creating modified copies.

methods.name: BusinessGroup.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a BusinessGroup instance from a Map, typically retrieved from a database.

methods.name: BusinessGroup.toMap
methods.description: Serializes the BusinessGroup instance into a Map for storage or transmission.

methods.name: BusinessGroup.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the current BusinessGroup with optional updated fields.
